jobDescription: Marketing Events Manager  Newark, CA RMS is seeking a superstar to join the Corporate Marketing team. The Marketing Events Manager is responsible for working effectively with clients, internal teams, industry organizations and external vendors to deliver top notch event programs that drive successful results. The Events Manager will report to the Senior Manager, Marketing Events and work within the Marketing team to enhance and execute our programs. Our ideal candidate should thrive under pressure and have a passion for event production and logistics. Key Accountabilities & Deliverables:Support/Manage the planning and execution of assigned event programs of various size and scale.Develop and manage external partners and vendors for multiple events.Support the field marketing team on our client facing events.Create/Manage an internal speaker bureauCreate/Manage a worldwide industry events calendarPartner with internal cross-functional teams to create event agendas and content that meets engagement objectives.Develop and manage planning tools; i.e. budget tracking, project timeline, production schedules, event specs, meeting agendas, notesetc.Lead creation of event communications and promotion for assigned programs to drive meaningful attendance.Track budget costs throughout the course of project and communicate scope changes that effect budget in a clear manner. Reconcile budgets and lead internal and external project debriefs.Establish, maintain and enhance relationships with all team members and departments (product marketing, creative, operations, client development and support, finance, legal, etc).Drive negotiations and project management of critical events and deliver flawless event plans.Gather and track ROI, engagement analytics and feedback to consistently assesses opportunities for improvement.Be a team player that is willing to build out and manage processes internally and cross functionally that will ensure the success of our events with our global production partners.Experience Required:3+ years of event management and planning experienceStrong competencies: client focus, accountability for results, team effectiveness.
